languages.text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
languages.original_text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 при любых {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также −30% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Suffers a −30 penalty to any Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, dodge, and parry tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
Suffers a −30 penalty to any Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, dodge, or parry tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
Suffers a −30 penalty to any Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, dodge, or parry tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

languages.text: Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -30 für {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} sowie einen Abzug von -30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 auf jede Probe für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}. Une pénalité de −30 % s'applique également à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}l'esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -30 s'applique aux tests de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour le faire disparaître.

Une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30 s'applique aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g}. Une pénalité de −30 % s'applique également à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour le faire disparaître.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}率降低30%。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}检定都会承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −30 a las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y una penalización del −30 % a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}. El efecto se elimina al final del combate. Si se adquiere fuera de combate, se elimina visitando la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -30 a cualquier prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に-30、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の判定に−30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}判定に-30の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

languages.text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 при любых {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверках{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также −30% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также −30% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также −30% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerine{/g} −30, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine −%30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Suffers a −30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} and a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
